get.summary: Start an operation that can wait for metric ingest process to complete
get.description: Start an operation that can wait for metric ingest process to complete.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Long running operation has been accepted and the URI in the Location header should be polled for completion.

Location.description: URI to poll for long running operation result

get.summary: Gets the specified run within the specified workspace
get.description: Gets the specified run within the specified workspace

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

inputDatasets.description: A list of dataset used as input to the run.

error.description: The top level error that occurred.

correlation.description: Dictionary containing correlation details for the error.

code.description: The service-defined error code. Supported error codes: ServiceError, UserError, ValidationError, AzureStorageError, TransientError, RequestThrottled.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

messageFormat.description: An unformatted version of the message with no variable substitution.

messageParameters.description: Value substitutions corresponding to the contents of MessageFormat.

referenceCode.description: This code can optionally be set by the system generating the error. It should be used to classify the problem and identify the module and code area where the failure occured.

detailsUri.description: A URI which points to more details about the context of the error.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

details.description: The related errors that occurred during the request.

innerError.description: A nested list of inner errors. When evaluating errors, clients MUST traverse through all of the nested "innerErrors" and choose the deepest one that they understand.

debugInfo.description: An internal representation of the error. May be null for non-AzureML services.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

innerError.description: A nested list of inner errors. When evaluating errors, clients MUST traverse through all of the nested "innerErrors" and choose the deepest one that they understand.

DebugInfoResponse.description: Internal debugging information not intended for external clients.

data.description: The data associated with the error.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group in which the workspace is located.
